item.title: 中国推进回收利用有可能拖累金属需求
item.description:
虽然该行业寄希望于最近的经济刺激计划来推动其发展，但重新利用商品的努力可能会产生更大的影响。【原文：

While the industry is banking on a recent stimulus blitz to give it a boost, efforts to reuse commodities might prove more consequential.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡齐米尔称 12 月利率会议前景广阔
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）表示，欧洲中央银行在 2024 年的最后一次会议上仍将保持灵活性，他说，通货紧缩的 "基础稳固"，有可能进一步削减借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank remains flexible going into its final meeting of 2024, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir, who said disinflation is on a “solid footing” and more cuts in borrowing costs are possible.】

item.title: 美国大选对市场的意义
item.description: 今年最重要的事件之一--11 月 5 日的美国总统大选--还有几天就要举行了。对于华尔街来说，民主党候选人、副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）与共和党前总统、提名人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）之间的竞争，在利率、劳动力市场以及欧洲和中东冲突的不确定性已经在考验投资者神经的时候，又增加了一层波动性。【原文：One of the most crucial events of the year — the US presidential election on Nov. 5 — is days away. For Wall Street, the race between Vice President Kamala Harris, the Democratic candidate, and Republican former President and nominee Donald Trump adds a layer of volatility at a time when uncertainty about interest rates, the labor market and conflicts in Europe and the Middle East are already testing investor nerves.】

item.title: 台积电的霸主地位开始让对手感到担忧
item.description: 台湾最大的公司给全球最重要的电子产品投下了越来越大的阴影。但首先...【原文：Taiwan’s biggest company casts an ever-growing shadow over the world’s most important electronics. But first...】

item.title: 高盛表示，投资者希望更多地接触私人信贷
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Many investors think they’re under-allocated to private credit and are looking for more ways to take a slice of the $1.7 trillion market, according to a private markets survey from Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 摩根大通数据显示美国大选临近，美元需求激增
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co）的策略师援引他们的专有指标称，由于投资者押注美国大选前的反弹，上周对美元的需求激增，而且这种买盘可能会持续。【原文：Demand for the dollar surged last week as investors bet on a rally in the run-up to the US election, and this buying is likely to continue, said strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co, citing their proprietary metrics.】

item.title: 赞比亚寻求与投资者达成协议以开发采矿许可证
item.description: 赞比亚计划与投资者共同开发数十个采矿许可证，以提高这个非洲第二大铜生产国的铜产量。【原文：Zambia plans to develop dozens of mining licenses together with investors to boost copper output in Africa’s second-biggest producer.】

item.title: 内部人士正在抛售 2024 年的大牛市
item.description: 风险资产最近不乏买家。美国股市刚刚结束了连续第六周的上涨，散户情绪高涨，美国银行的基金经理调查也显示机构投资者也看涨。【原文：Risk assets have had no shortage of buyers lately. US stocks just capped their sixth straight up week, retail sentiment is sky high, and Bank of America’s fund manager survey showed bullishness rules the institutional set, too.】

item.title: 埃伯里称：2025 年兰特将上涨，而奈拉将面临更多痛苦
item.description: Ebury Partners Ltd.认为，进入下一年，非洲主要货币的前景喜忧参半，南非兰特的表现将优于其他货币，而尼日利亚奈拉在情况好转之前将面临更多的痛苦。【原文：The outlook is mixed for major African currencies going into the next year, with South Africa’s rand set to outperform and Nigeria’s naira facing more pain before things get better, according to Ebury Partners Ltd.】

item.title: 阿布扎比寻求数十亿美元食品投资以实现净出口
item.description: 阿布扎比正在努力吸引农业食品公司数十亿美元的投资，因为全球供应链的中断正在刺激人们追求更高的自给自足。【原文：Abu Dhabi is seeking to attract billions of dollars in investments from agrifood companies as supply chain disruptions around the world are spurring a quest for greater self-sufficiency.】

item.title: 莫桑比克警方使用催泪瓦斯驱散抗议者和记者
item.description: 莫桑比克警方周一发射催泪瓦斯驱散了采访反对党总统候选人蒙德拉内（Venâncio Mondlane）的记者。【原文：Mozambican police on Monday fired teargas to disperse reporters interviewing the opposition presidential candidate Venâncio Mondlane, who had called for protests against the Oct. 9 vote and weekend murder of his lawyer.】

item.title: Hygenco 称印度绿色氢气价格开始下降
item.description: 据印度的一家氢气生产商称，利用可再生能源生产的氢气在印度的售价开始低于使用天然气生产的氢气。【原文：Hydrogen produced using renewable power is starting to sell for less than that made with natural gas in India, according to a producer there.】

item.title: 越南在党魁卸任后选举总统
item.description: 越南议会任命政治局委员良强（Luong Cuong）为主席，接替卸任的共产党主席杜林（To Lam），此举加强了政府的集体权力分享。【原文：Vietnam’s parliament has named Politburo member Luong Cuong as president, replacing Communist Party chief To Lam who stepped down from the role in a move that reinforces the government’s collective power sharing.】

item.title: 微软推出人工智能代理，加深与 Salesforce 的竞争
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）正在推出一套人工智能工具，旨在代表企业员工发送电子邮件、管理记录和采取其他行动，从而扩大人工智能的推进力度，加剧与Salesforce Inc.等竞争对手的竞争。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is launching a set of artificial intelligence tools designed to send emails, manage records and take other actions on behalf of business workers, expanding an AI push that intensifies competition with rivals like Salesforce Inc.】

item.title: 中国平安称利润上升，股市反弹提升回报率
item.description: 中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司（Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co. said profit jumped 36% for the first nine months of this year, after a stock-market rally bolstered investment returns at China’s second-largest insurer by market value.】

item.title: 据说盛宝银行将吸引 Altor 领导的 Interactive Brokers 集团入股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，互动经纪集团公司（Interactive Brokers Group Inc.【原文：Interactive Brokers Group Inc. and a consortium of Altor Equity Partners and Centerbridge Partners are among those that have shown initial interest in acquiring Denmark’s Saxo Bank A/S, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 高盛策略师称，S&P 500 指数十年大涨已结束
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US stocks are unlikely to sustain their above-average performance of the past decade as investors turn to other assets including bonds for better returns, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists said.】

item.title: 美联储大幅减息后抵押贷款利率为何上升
item.description:
基准利率和住房贷款之间有什么联系？【原文：

What’s the link between benchmark rates and home loans?

】

item.title: 回收电子废弃物的惊人暴利行业
item.description:
在尼日利亚和其他地方，企业家们通过拆解电子产品赚钱，并将有价值的金属运回发达国家。【原文：

In Nigeria and elsewhere, entrepreneurs are making money by dismantling electronics—and sending valuable metals back to the developed world.

】

item.title: 美联储大幅减息后抵押贷款利率为何上升
item.description: 美联储大幅减息后抵押贷款利率为何上升【原文：Why Mortgage Rates Went Up After the Fed’s Big Cut】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯称利率显然将进一步下调
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，如果通胀下行趋势持续，借贷成本将进一步降低，但他不愿预测官员们下次会议的结果。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus said borrowing costs will be reduced further should the downtrend in inflation persist, though he wouldn’t predict the outcome of officials’ next meeting.】

item.title: 利润率受挤压，科塔克股价创四月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. ）的股价创下了自 4 月份以来的最差表现，原因是监管机构禁止其在线平台和信用卡的客户注册，导致其第二季度的利润率下降。【原文：Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.’s shares saw their worst day since April as a regulator’s ban on onboarding customers to its online platforms and credit cards slashed its margins in the second quarter.】

item.title: 与恒大许家印有关的香港豪宅尚未找到买家
item.description: 在被债权人查封 11 个月后，与中国恒大集团创始人许家印有关联的两栋相邻豪宅仍在以大折扣寻找买家。【原文：Eleven months after being seized by creditors, two adjacent mansions tied to China Evergrande Group’s founder Hui Ka Yan continue to seek buyers at big discounts.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计南非首次公开募股将因经济乐观而激增
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：South Africa is poised for a surge in initial public offerings and fund-raising activity as soon as next year, spurred by optimism that the continent’s biggest economy may be turning a corner after years of lackluster growth, said JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 欧尔班推动增长让匈牙利投资者担心局势动荡
item.description: 匈牙利政府正在采取人们所熟悉的干预经济的策略，这让投资者感到紧张，担心该国的资产在 2026 年大选前将继续表现不佳。【原文：Hungary’s government is resorting to familiar tactics of interventions in the economy, leaving investors nervous that the country’s assets will keep underperforming in the run-up to elections in 2026.】

item.title: 以色列准备应对袭击事件，欧洲天然气走高
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势给市场带来了新一波波动，欧洲天然气价格走高。【原文：European natural gas prices edged higher as Middle East tensions brought a fresh wave of volatility to the market.】

item.title: 中国顶级量化投资人在市场反弹中结束投资策略
item.description: 中国一家顶级量化对冲基金正在关闭其市场中性产品，退出这一策略。最近，由于本地股大涨挤压了该基金的空头头寸，导致行业普遍亏损。【原文：A top Chinese quantitative hedge fund is shutting down its market-neutral products, exiting a strategy that saw widespread industry losses recently when a surge in local stocks squeezed their short positions.】

item.title: 炙手可热的印度私人信贷市场因繁荣加剧而面临风险
item.description: 印度的私人信贷市场增长迅猛，大量新参与者涌入直接借贷领域，加剧了人们对借贷标准弱化的担忧。【原文：India’s private credit market is growing so fast that a rush of new participants into the direct-lending sector is fueling concern about a weakening of lending standards.】

item.title: T. Rowe称10年期国债收益率可能在六个月内触及5%的水平
item.description: 据 T. Rowe Price 公司称，由于通胀预期上升以及对美国财政支出的担忧，基准国债收益率可能很快会触及一个关键水平。【原文：Benchmark Treasury yields may soon hit a key level on the back of rising inflation expectations and concerns over US fiscal spending, according to T. Rowe Price.】

item.title: 国际能源署称石油需求增长疲软将因中国和电动汽车而持续
item.description: 国际能源机构称，由于中国经济放缓和电动汽车的迅速普及，全球石油需求增长将继续减弱。【原文：Global oil demand growth will continue to weaken due to China’s economic slowdown and the rapid uptake of electric vehicles, according to the International Energy Agency.】
